description: Use our Searchlight service to alert you to changes in ownership or extent information.

details.body:
Use Searchlight to receive regular updates to electronic extent data (polygons) or Property Portfolio Consolidator information, to make sure it stays accurate.

You can choose to receive annual, biannual, quarterly or monthly updates.

For polygon updates:

  • you define a geographical area
  • we scan for changes
  • you receive a new data layer that provides a fresh visual representation of registered land ownership through your Geographic Information System

For Property Portfolio Consolidator updates:

  • we scan for updates against your company name or against a list of title numbers
  • we email the results to you in an Excel spreadsheet

Cost

Prices for the response file vary, depending on the level and format of data required along with the activity seen. A minimum charge applies. All prices do not include VAT.

Frequency of updates Yearly Subscription
Monthly £2,500
Quarterly £900
Bi-annual £500
One-off £300

More information

To discuss these services and prices, please contact us.

Data Services Team

HM Land Registry
Rosebrae Court
Woodside Ferry Approach
Birkenhead
Merseyside
CH41 6DU

Email data.services@mail.landregistry.gov.uk

Contact form https://help.landregis...

Telephone 0300 006 0478
